summary.span: 表示应用程序域，它是一个应用程序在其中执行的独立环境。

span.span: Represents an application domain, which is an isolated environment where applications execute.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序域，由表示对象，可帮助为执行托管的代码提供隔离、 卸载和安全边界。Application domains, which are represented by objects, help provide isolation, unloading, and security boundaries for executing managed code. - 使用应用程序域隔离可能会终止进程的任务。Use application domains to isolate tasks that might bring down a process. 如果状态的正在执行的任务变得不稳定，而不会影响该过程，可以卸载。If the state of the that's executing a task becomes unstable, the can be unloaded without affecting the process. 进程必须运行很长一段无需重新启动时，这很重要。This is important when a process must run for long periods without restarting. 此外可以使用应用程序域隔离不应共享数据的任务。You can also use application domains to isolate tasks that should not share data. - 如果程序集加载到默认应用程序域，它不能从内存中卸载进程运行时。If an assembly is loaded into the default application domain, it cannot be unloaded from memory while the process is running. 但是，如果您打开第二个应用程序域加载和执行程序集，程序集是卸载该应用程序域卸载时。However, if you open a second application domain to load and execute the assembly, the assembly is unloaded when that application domain is unloaded. 使用此方法最大程度减少偶尔使用大型 Dll 的长时间运行进程的工作集。Use this technique to minimize the working set of long-running processes that occasionally use large DLLs. 可以在单个进程; 中运行多个应用程序域但是，没有应用程序域和线程之间具有一对一的相关性。Multiple application domains can run in a single process; however, there is not a one-to-one correlation between application domains and threads. 多个线程可以属于单个应用程序域，并且给定的线程并不局限于单个应用程序域，在任何给定时间，而在单个应用程序域中执行一个线程。Several threads can belong to a single application domain, and while a given thread is not confined to a single application domain, at any given time, a thread executes in a single application domain. 使用创建应用程序域方法。Application domains are created using the method. 使用实例来加载和执行程序集 ()。 instances are used to load and execute assemblies (). 当是不能再在使用中，可能会被卸载。When an is no longer in use, it can be unloaded. 类实现一组事件，使应用程序进行响应时的应用程序域将被卸载，加载程序集或引发未经处理的异常。The class implements a set of events that enable applications to respond when an assembly is loaded, when an application domain will be unloaded, or when an unhandled exception is thrown. 使用应用程序域的详细信息，请参阅[应用程序域](~/docs/framework/app-domains/application-domains.md)。For more information on using application domains, see [Application Domains](~/docs/framework/app-domains/application-domains.md). 此类实现， ，和接口。This class implements the , , and interfaces. 决不要创建的可远程处理包装对象。You should never create a remotable wrapper for an object. 执行此操作可以将发布到的远程引用，如公开方法远程访问和有效地销毁该代码访问安全性。Doing so could publish a remote reference to that , exposing methods such as to remote access and effectively destroying code access security for that . 恶意客户端连接到远程无法获取任何资源的访问权限本身有权访问。Malicious clients connecting to the remoted could obtain access to any resource the itself has access to. 不要创建可远程处理的任何类型，将扩展包装并实现恶意客户端无法用于绕过安全系统的方法。Do not create remotable wrappers for any type that extends and that implements methods that could be used by malicious clients to bypass the security system. > [!CAUTION] > 默认值为属性是`false`。The default value for the property is `false`. 此设置是不安全的服务。This setting is unsafe for services. 若要防止服务下载部分受信任的代码，请将此属性设置为`true`。To prevent services from downloading partially trusted code, set this property to `true`. ## Examples 此示例演示如何创建一个新，实例化类型中的新，并与该类型的对象进行通信。This example shows how to create a new , instantiate a type in that new , and communicate with that type’s object. 此外，此示例演示如何卸载导致要进行垃圾回收的对象。In addition, this example shows how to unload the causing the object to be garbage collected. [!code-cpp[AppDomainX#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomainX/cpp/AppDomainX.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AppDomainX#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomainX/cs/AppDomainX.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AppDomainX#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomainX/VB/AppDomainX.vb#1)]

summary.span: 在加载程序集时发生。

span.span: Occurs when an assembly is loaded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 委托此事件指示哪些程序集被加载。The delegate for this event indicates what assembly was loaded. 若要注册此事件的事件处理程序，必须具有所需的权限，或引发。To register an event handler for this event, you must have the required permissions, or a is thrown. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何事件。The following sample demonstrates the event. 有关运行此代码示例，必须提供完全限定的程序集名称。For this code example to run, you must provide the fully qualified assembly name. 有关如何获取完全限定的程序集名称的信息，请参阅[程序集名称](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md)。For information about how to obtain the fully qualified assembly name, see [Assembly Names](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md). [!code-cpp[AppDomain_AssemblyLoad#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomain_AssemblyLoad/CPP/assemblyload.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AppDomain_AssemblyLoad#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomain_AssemblyLoad/CS/assemblyload.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AppDomain_AssemblyLoad#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomain_AssemblyLoad/VB/assemblyload.vb#1)]

summary.span: 在对程序集的解析失败时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the resolution of an assembly fails.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 它负责对于此事件，将返回该程序集指定属性，或返回空值，如果无法识别该程序集。It is the responsibility of the for this event to return the assembly that is specified by the property, or to return null if the assembly is not recognized. 程序集必须加载到执行上下文;如果加载到只反射上下文中，导致引发此事件则加载会失败。The assembly must be loaded into an execution context; if it is loaded into the reflection-only context, the load that caused this event to be raised fails. 使用此事件的指南，请参阅[解析程序集加载](~/docs/framework/app-domains/resolve-assembly-loads.md)。For guidance on the use of this event, see [Resolving Assembly Loads](~/docs/framework/app-domains/resolve-assembly-loads.md). 开头[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，则属性返回请求无法解析的程序集加载的程序集。Beginning with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], the property returns the assembly that requested the assembly load that could not be resolved. 例如，加载程序可能无法加载请求的程序集的依赖项，因为请求的程序集和其依赖项不在探测路径中。For example, the loader might be unable to load a dependency of the requesting assembly because the requesting assembly and its dependency are not in the probing path. 如果多个依赖项的版本可用，知道请求的程序集的标识可能很有用或标识正确的版本中，查找依赖项中。Knowing the identity of the requesting assembly might be useful in locating the dependency or in identifying the correct version, if more than one version of the dependency is available. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . > [!IMPORTANT] > 开头[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]，则事件引发的所有程序集，包括资源程序集。Beginning with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], the event is raised for all assemblies, including resource assemblies. 在早期版本中的资源程序集不引发事件。In earlier versions, the event was not raised for resource assemblies. 如果本地化操作系统，则可能会调用处理程序多个时间： 为每个区域性回退链中的一次。If the operating system is localized, the handler might be called multiple times: once for each culture in the fallback chain. 对于此事件，属性返回的程序集名称之前应用策略。For this event, the property returns the assembly name before policy is applied. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果此事件注册了多个事件处理程序，直到事件处理程序返回一个值的顺序事件 handlersarecalled 这并不是`null`。If more than one event handler is registered for this event, the event handlersarecalled in order until an event handler returns a value that isn't `null`. 后续的事件处理程序将被忽略。Subsequent event handlers are ignored. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何事件。The following sample demonstrates the event. 有关运行此代码示例，必须提供完全限定的程序集名称。For this code example to run, you must provide the fully qualified assembly name. 有关如何获取完全限定的程序集名称的信息，请参阅[程序集名称](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md)。For information about how to obtain the fully qualified assembly name, see [Assembly Names](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md). [!code-cpp[AssemblyResolve#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyResolve/CPP/assemblyresolve.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AssemblyResolve#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyResolve/CS/assemblyresolve.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AssemblyResolve#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyResolve/VB/assemblyresolve.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法的重载使用默认应用程序域中的信息。This method overload uses the information from the default application domain. 如果`securityInfo`是未提供，使用从当前的应用程序域证据。If `securityInfo` is not supplied, the evidence from the current application domain is used. > [!IMPORTANT] > 不使用此方法的重载来创建沙盒应用程序域。Do not use this method overload to create sandboxed application domains. 开头[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，为提供的证据`securityInfo`不会再影响应用程序域的授予集。Beginning with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], the evidence that is supplied for `securityInfo` no longer affects the grant set of the application domain. 使用方法重载来创建沙盒应用程序域。Use the method overload to create sandboxed application domains. ## Examples 下面的示例演示一般情况下，如何创建使用其中一个域重载。The following sample demonstrates, in general, how to create a domain using one of the overloads. summary.span: 使用证据、应用程序基路径、相对搜索路径和指定是否向应用程序域中加载程序集的影像副本的形参创建具有给定名称的新应用程序域。

span.span: Creates a new application domain with the given name, using evidence, application base path, relative search path, and a parameter that specifies whether a shadow copy of an assembly is to be loaded into the application domain.

summary.span: 指定在初始化应用程序域时调用的回调方法，以及传递回调方法的字符串实参数组。

span.span: Specifies a callback method that is invoked when the application domain is initialized, and an array of string arguments to pass the callback method.

returns.span: 新创建的应用程序域。

span.span: The newly created application domain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所表示的方法`adInit`新创建的应用程序域的上下文中执行。The method represented by `adInit` is executed in the context of the newly created application domain. 如果`securityInfo`是未提供，使用从当前的应用程序域证据。If `securityInfo` is not supplied, the evidence from the current application domain is used. 有关卷影复制的详细信息，请参阅并[卷影复制程序集](~/docs/framework/app-domains/shadow-copy-assemblies.md)。For more information about shadow copying, see and [Shadow Copying Assemblies](~/docs/framework/app-domains/shadow-copy-assemblies.md). > [!IMPORTANT] > 不使用此方法的重载来创建沙盒应用程序域。Do not use this method overload to create sandboxed application domains. 开头[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，为提供的证据`securityInfo`不会再影响应用程序域的授予集。Beginning with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], the evidence that is supplied for `securityInfo` no longer affects the grant set of the application domain. 使用方法重载来创建沙盒应用程序域。Use the method overload to create sandboxed application domains.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法调用的默认构造函数`typeName`。This method calls the default constructor for `typeName`. 请参阅的格式为`assemblyName`。See for the format of `assemblyName`. 尝试调用在目标上不是当前的应用程序域的应用程序域将导致目标应用程序域中的程序集的成功加载。An attempt to call on a target application domain that is not the current application domain will result in a successful load of the assembly in the target application domain. 由于不是，当此方法尝试返回到当前应用程序域加载程序集，公共语言运行时将尝试将该程序集加载到当前应用程序域和负载可能会失败。Since an is not , when this method attempts to return the for the loaded assembly to the current application domain, the common language runtime will try to load the assembly into the current application domain and the load might fail. 加载到当前应用程序域的程序集可能不同于不同的两个应用程序域的路径设置是否首先加载的程序集。The assembly that is loaded into the current application domain might be different from the assembly that was loaded first if the path settings for the two application domains are different.

param.name: assemblyName
param.span: 程序集的显示名称。

param.name: ignoreCase

span.span: A Boolean value specifying whether to perform a case-sensitive search or not.

param.name: bindingAttr
param.span: 影响 typeName 构造函数搜索的零个或多个位标志的组合。

span.span: A combination of zero or more bit flags that affect the search for the typeName constructor.

param.span: 如果 bindingAttr 为零，则对公共构造函数进行区分大小写的搜索。

span.span: If bindingAttr is zero, a case-sensitive search for public constructors is conducted.

param.name: binder
param.span: 一个对象，它使用反射启用绑定、参数类型的强制、成员的调用和 对象的检索。

span.span: An object that enables the binding, coercion of argument types, invocation of members, and retrieval of objects using reflection.

param.span: 如果 binder 为 null，则使用默认联编程序。

span.span: If binder is null, the default binder is used.

param.name: args

span.span: The arguments to pass to the constructor.

param.span: 此实参数组必须在数量、顺序和类型方面与要调用的构造函数的形参匹配。

span.span: This array of arguments must match in number, order, and type the parameters of the constructor to invoke.

param.span: 如果默认的构造函数是首选构造函数，则 args 必须为空数组或 null。

span.span: If the default constructor is preferred, args must be an empty array or null.

param.name: culture
param.span: 区域性特定的信息，这些信息控制将 args 强制转换为 typeName 构造函数所声明的正式类型。

span.span: Culture-specific information that governs the coercion of args to the formal types declared for the typeName constructor.

param.span: 如果 culture 为 ，则使用当前线程的 。

span.span: If culture is , the for the current thread is used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请参阅的格式为`assemblyName`。See for the format of `assemblyName`. 尝试调用在目标上不是当前的应用程序域的应用程序域将导致目标应用程序域中的程序集的成功加载。An attempt to call on a target application domain that is not the current application domain will result in a successful load of the assembly in the target application domain. 由于不是，当此方法尝试返回到当前应用程序域加载程序集，公共语言运行时将尝试将该程序集加载到当前应用程序域和负载可能会失败。Since an is not , when this method attempts to return the for the loaded assembly to the current application domain, the common language runtime will try to load the assembly into the current application domain and the load might fail. 加载到当前应用程序域的程序集可能不同于不同的两个应用程序域的路径设置是否首先加载的程序集。The assembly that is loaded into the current application domain might be different from the assembly that was loaded first if the path settings for the two application domains are different.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是一个便利方法，将组合在一起和。This is a convenience method that combines and . 此方法调用的默认构造函数`typeName`。This method calls the default constructor for `typeName`. 请参阅的格式为`assemblyName`。See for the format of `assemblyName`. 请参阅属性的格式`typeName`。See the property for the format of `typeName`. > [!NOTE] > 如果进行早期绑定调用的方法`M`的类型的对象`T1`返回，和方法可对类型的对象的方法的早期绑定调用`T2`程序集中`C`以外当前程序集或包含的程序集`T1`，程序集`C`加载到当前应用程序域。If you make an early-bound call to a method `M` of an object of type `T1` that was returned by , and that method makes an early-bound call to a method of an object of type `T2` in an assembly `C` other than the current assembly or the assembly containing `T1`, assembly `C` is loaded into the current application domain. 即使早期绑定调用也会发生这种加载`T1.M()`中的正文进行，或其他动态生成的代码中。This loading occurs even if the early-bound call to `T1.M()` was made in the body of a , or in other dynamically generated code. 如果当前域是默认域，程序集`C`在进程结束前不能卸载。If the current domain is the default domain, assembly `C` cannot be unloaded until the process ends. 如果当前域更高版本尝试加载程序集`C`，负载可能会失败。If the current domain later attempts to load assembly `C`, the load might fail. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了另一个应用程序域中执行代码的最简单方法。The following code example shows the simplest way to execute code in another application domain. 该示例定义一个名为类`Worker`，它继承自。The example defines a class named `Worker` that inherits from . `Worker`类定义的方法，将显示在其中执行的应用程序域的名称。The `Worker` class defines a method that displays the name of the application domain in which it is executing. 该示例创建的实例`Worker`在默认应用程序域和新的应用程序域中。The example creates instances of `Worker` in the default application domain and in a new application domain. > [!NOTE] > 包含的程序集`Worker`必须加载到这两个应用程序域，但是它可以加载仅在新的应用程序域中存在的其他程序集。The assembly that contains `Worker` must be loaded into both application domains, but it can load other assemblies that exist only in the new application domain. [!code-cpp[CreateInstanceAndUnwrap2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CreateInstanceAndUnwrap2/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CreateInstanceAndUnwrap2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CreateInstanceAndUnwrap2/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CreateInstanceAndUnwrap2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CreateInstanceAndUnwrap2/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是一个便利方法，将组合在一起和。This is a convenience method that combines and . 请参阅的格式为`assemblyName`。See for the format of `assemblyName`. 请参阅属性的格式`typeName`。See the property for the format of `typeName`. > [!NOTE] > 如果进行早期绑定调用的方法`M`的类型的对象`T1`返回，和方法可对类型的对象的方法的早期绑定调用`T2`程序集中`C`以外当前程序集或包含的程序集`T1`，程序集`C`加载到当前应用程序域。If you make an early-bound call to a method `M` of an object of type `T1` that was returned by , and that method makes an early-bound call to a method of an object of type `T2` in an assembly `C` other than the current assembly or the assembly containing `T1`, assembly `C` is loaded into the current application domain. 即使早期绑定调用也会发生这种加载`T1.M()`中的正文进行，或其他动态生成的代码中。This loading occurs even if the early-bound call to `T1.M()` was made in the body of a , or in other dynamically generated code. 如果当前域是默认域，程序集`C`在进程结束前不能卸载。If the current domain is the default domain, assembly `C` cannot be unloaded until the process ends. 如果当前域更高版本尝试加载程序集`C`，负载可能会失败。If the current domain later attempts to load assembly `C`, the load might fail. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用`ignoreCase`参数。The following sample demonstrates the use of the `ignoreCase` parameter. param.name: assemblyFile
param.span: 文件的名称（包括路径），该文件包含定义所请求类型的程序集。

span.span: The name, including the path, of a file that contains an assembly that defines the requested type.

param.span: 该程序集是使用 方法加载的。

span.span: The assembly is loaded using the method.

param.name: typeName
param.span: 属性返回的所请求类型的完全限定名称，包含命名空间而不是程序集。

span.span: The fully qualified name of the requested type, including the namespace but not the assembly, as returned by the property.

summary.span: 创建在指定程序集文件中定义的指定类型的新实例。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the specified type defined in the specified assembly file.

returns.span: 一个对象，它是新实例的包装，或者如果找不到 ，则为 。

span.span: An object that is a wrapper for the new instance, or if is not found.

returns.span: 返回值需要打开包装才能访问真实对象。

span.span: The return value needs to be unwrapped to access the real object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认构造函数`typeName`调用。The default constructor for `typeName` is invoked. 有关更多信息，请参见 方法。For more information, see the method. 当方法用于在目标应用程序域，而不从其进行调用的应用程序域中创建一个实例，该程序集是加载目标应用程序域中。When the method is used to create an instance in a target application domain, other than the application domain from which the call is made, the assembly is loaded in the target application domain. 但是，如果在调用应用程序域实例解包，以某些方式使用未包装的实例可能导致程序集加载到调用应用程序域。However, if the instance is unwrapped in the calling application domain, using the unwrapped instance in certain ways can cause the assembly to be loaded into the calling application domain. 例如，该实例进行解包后，可能会请求其类型信息、 要调用其方法后期绑定的。For example, after the instance is unwrapped, its type information might be requested, in order to call its methods late-bound. 程序集加载到调用应用程序域时，会发生异常。When the assembly is loaded into the calling application domain, exceptions can occur. - 如果在同一程序集中的另一个版本之前加载到调用应用程序域，或调用应用程序域加载路径是不同的目标应用程序域的异常，如可能发生。If another version of the same assembly was previously loaded into the calling application domain, or if the load path of the calling application domain is different from that of the target application domain, exceptions such as can occur. - 如果调用应用程序域进行早期绑定调用的实例类型，可能会尝试强制转换实例时引发。If the calling application domain makes early-bound calls to the instance type, can be thrown when an attempt is made to cast the instance. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法重载来在目标应用程序域中创建对象的实例并调用其方法。The following example shows how to use the method overload to create an instance of an object in a target application domain and call its methods. 该示例定义了`MarshallableExample`类，该类可以跨应用程序域边界封送。The example defines the `MarshallableExample` class, which can be marshaled across application domain boundaries. 此示例生成一个对当前正在执行的程序集的路径、 创建目标应用程序域，并使用方法重载来示例程序集加载到目标应用程序域并创建一个实例的`MarshallableExample`。The example builds a path to the currently executing assembly, creates a target application domain, and uses the method overload to load the example assembly into the target application domain and create an instance of `MarshallableExample`. > [!NOTE] > 路径是绝对地址在此示例中，但相对路径也将起作用，因为方法用于加载程序集。The path is absolute in this example, but a relative path would also work because the method is used to load the assembly. 取消包装操作对象句柄之后, 的示例演示三种方法可以在目标应用程序域中使用对象：After unwrapping the object handle, the example demonstrates three ways to use an object in a target application domain: - 与使用反射的后期绑定调用的方法。Invoking a method with late binding, using reflection. 这需要类型信息，这会导致要加载到调用方的应用程序域的程序集。This requires type information, which causes the assembly to be loaded into the application domain of the caller. （在此示例中，它已经加载。）(In this example, it is already loaded.) - 强制转换为调用方和被调用方所知的接口的对象。Casting the object to an interface known to both the caller and the callee. 如果在调用程序集或在调用方和被调用方所引用的第三个程序集中定义接口，则调用的程序集不是加载到调用方的应用程序域。If the interface is defined in the calling assembly or in a third assembly referenced by both the caller and the callee, the called assembly is not loaded into the application domain of the caller. - 直接调用方知道其类型时使用的对象。Using the object directly when its type is known to the caller. 程序集必须加载到调用方的应用程序域。The assembly must be loaded into the application domain of the caller. 若要避免被调用的程序集加载到调用方的应用程序域的另一个方法是调用方为派生类和定义可以在目标应用程序域中运行的方法。Another way to avoid loading the called assembly into the application domain of the caller is for the caller to derive from the class and to define a method that can be run in the target application domain. 该方法可以使用反射来检查目标程序集，因为目标程序集已加载到目标应用程序域。That method can use reflection to examine a target assembly, because the target assembly is already loaded into the target application domain. 有关示例，请参阅属性。See the example for the property. [!code-cpp[System.AppDomain.CreateInstanceFrom_StringString#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.appdomain.createinstancefrom_stringstring/cpp/example.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.AppDomain.CreateInstanceFrom_StringString#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.appdomain.createinstancefrom_stringstring/cs/example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.AppDomain.CreateInstanceFrom_StringString#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.appdomain.createinstancefrom_stringstring/vb/example.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认构造函数`typeName`调用。The default constructor for `typeName` is invoked. 有关此方法的详细信息，请参阅方法。For more information about this method, see the method. 当方法用于在目标应用程序域，而不从其进行调用的应用程序域中创建一个实例，该程序集是加载目标应用程序域中。When the method is used to create an instance in a target application domain, other than the application domain from which the call is made, the assembly is loaded in the target application domain. 但是，如果在调用应用程序域实例解包，以某些方式使用未包装的实例可能导致程序集加载到调用应用程序域。However, if the instance is unwrapped in the calling application domain, using the unwrapped instance in certain ways can cause the assembly to be loaded into the calling application domain. 例如，该实例进行解包后，可能会请求其类型信息、 要调用其方法后期绑定的。For example, after the instance is unwrapped, its type information might be requested, in order to call its methods late-bound. 程序集加载到调用应用程序域时，会发生异常。When the assembly is loaded into the calling application domain, exceptions can occur. - 如果在同一程序集中的另一个版本之前加载到调用应用程序域，或调用应用程序域加载路径是不同的目标应用程序域的异常，如可能发生。If another version of the same assembly was previously loaded into the calling application domain, or if the load path of the calling application domain is different from that of the target application domain, exceptions such as can occur. - 如果调用应用程序域进行早期绑定调用的实例类型，可能会尝试强制转换实例时引发。If the calling application domain makes early-bound calls to the instance type, can be thrown when an attempt is made to cast the instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法只应该用于当前应用程序域中定义动态程序集。This method should only be used to define a dynamic assembly in the current application domain. 有关详细信息，请参阅方法重载。For more information, see the method overload. > [!NOTE] > 在开发期间用于发出动态程序集的代码，建议你使用的重载方法，它指定证据和权限，提供你想要有，并且包含的动态程序集的证据中`refusedPermissions`.During the development of code that emits dynamic assemblies, it is recommended that you use an overload of the method that specifies evidence and permissions, supply the evidence you want the dynamic assembly to have, and include in `refusedPermissions`. 其中包括在`refusedPermissions`参数可确保验证 MSIL。Including in the `refusedPermissions` parameter ensures that the MSIL is verified. 此技术的一个限制是，它还会导致与要求完全信任的代码一起使用时引发。A limitation of this technique is that it also causes to be thrown when used with code that demands full trust. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何方法和事件。The following sample demonstrates the method and event. 有关运行此代码示例，必须提供完全限定的程序集名称。For this code example to run, you must provide the fully qualified assembly name. 有关如何获取完全限定的程序集名称的信息，请参阅[程序集名称](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md)。For information about how to obtain the fully qualified assembly name, see [Assembly Names](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法重载来指定属性，除非在已应用创建动态程序集时，可能无法正常工作。Use this method overload to specify attributes that do not work correctly unless they are applied when a dynamic assembly is created. 例如，安全属性，如和即使添加了创建动态程序集后，可能无法正常工作。For example, security attributes such as and do not work correctly if they are added after a dynamic assembly has been created. 应使用此方法只能用于当前应用程序域中定义动态程序集。This method should be used only to define a dynamic assembly in the current application domain. 有关此限制的详细信息，请参阅方法重载。For more information about this restriction, see the method overload. 中引入了此方法重载[!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]。This method overload is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建动态程序集具有。The following code sample shows how to create a dynamic assembly that has the . 必须将属性指定的数组的元素为对象。The attribute must be specified as an element of an array of objects. 创建的第一步以获取该属性的构造函数。The first step in creating the is to obtain a constructor for the attribute. 构造函数没有任何参数，因此的空数组与调用方法对象来表示参数的类型。The constructor has no parameters, so the method is called with an empty array of objects to represent the types of the parameters. 第二步是将生成对象的构造函数类，以及类型的空数组来表示的参数。The second step is to pass the resulting object to the constructor for the class, together with an empty array of type to represent the arguments. 得到随后将传递到方法作为数组的唯一元素。The resulting is then passed to the method as the only element of an array. 示例代码在新的动态程序集中定义模块和一个类型，然后显示该程序集的属性。The example code defines a module and a type in the new dynamic assembly, and then displays the assembly's attributes. [!code-cpp[DefineDynamicAssemblyWithAttributes#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/DefineDynamicAssemblyWithAttributes/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[DefineDynamicAssemblyWithAttributes#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/DefineDynamicAssemblyWithAttributes/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DefineDynamicAssemblyWithAttributes#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/DefineDynamicAssemblyWithAttributes/vb/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有完全受信任调用方可以提供其`evidence`定义动态时。Only fully trusted callers can supply their `evidence` when defining a dynamic . 在运行时将映射通过安全策略，以确定授予的权限。The runtime will map the through the security policy to determine the granted permissions. 部分受信任的调用方必须提供 null `evidence`。Partially trusted callers must supply a null `evidence`. 如果`evidence`是`null`，在运行时将复制的权限集，即，当前授予和拒绝集，从调用方的到动态正在定义，并将策略标记为已解决。If `evidence` is `null`, the runtime copies the permission sets, that is, the current grant and deny sets, from the caller's to the dynamic being defined and marks policy as resolved. 如果动态是保存到磁盘，后面的加载将获取基于与位置相关联的策略授予其中已保存。If the dynamic is saved to disk, subsequent loads will get grants based on policies associated with the location where the was saved. 此方法只应该用于当前应用程序域中定义动态程序集。This method should only be used to define a dynamic assembly in the current application domain. 有关详细信息，请参阅方法重载。For more information, see the method overload. > [!NOTE] > 在开发期间用于发出动态程序集的代码，建议你使用的重载方法，它指定证据和权限，提供你想要有，并且包含的动态程序集的证据中`refusedPermissions`.During the development of code that emits dynamic assemblies, it is recommended that you use an overload of the method that specifies evidence and permissions, supply the evidence you want the dynamic assembly to have, and include in `refusedPermissions`. 其中包括在`refusedPermissions`参数可确保验证 MSIL。Including in the `refusedPermissions` parameter ensures that the MSIL is verified. 此技术的一个限制是，它还会导致与要求完全信任的代码一起使用时引发。A limitation of this technique is that it also causes to be thrown when used with code that demands full trust. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何方法和事件。The following sample demonstrates the method and the event. 首先，此代码示例尝试创建的实例`MyDynamicType`通过调用方法替换为无效的程序集名称，并捕获产生的异常。First, the code example tries to create an instance of `MyDynamicType` by calling the method with an invalid assembly name, and catches the resulting exception. 然后，该代码示例添加的事件处理程序事件，并再次尝试创建的实例`MyDynamicType`。The code example then adds an event handler for the event, and again tries to create an instance of`MyDynamicType`. 在调用，则为无效的程序集引发事件。During the call to , the event is raised for the invalid assembly. 事件处理程序将创建包含名为的类型的动态程序集`MyDynamicType`，提供的类型无参数构造函数，并返回新的动态程序集。The event handler creates a dynamic assembly that contains a type named `MyDynamicType`, gives the type a parameterless constructor, and returns the new dynamic assembly. 在调用成功，然后完成的构造函数和`MyDynamicType`在控制台上显示一条消息。The call to then finishes successfully, and the constructor for `MyDynamicType` displays a message at the console. [!code-cpp[AppDomain_DefineDynamicAssembly#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomain_DefineDynamicAssembly/CPP/definedynamicassembly.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AppDomain_DefineDynamicAssembly#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomain_DefineDynamicAssembly/CS/definedynamicassembly.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AppDomain_DefineDynamicAssembly#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomain_DefineDynamicAssembly/VB/definedynamicassembly.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法只应该用于当前应用程序域中定义动态程序集。This method should only be used to define a dynamic assembly in the current application domain. 有关详细信息，请参阅方法重载。For more information, see the method overload. > [!NOTE] > 在开发期间用于发出动态程序集的代码，建议你使用的重载方法，它指定证据和权限，提供你想要有，并且包含的动态程序集的证据中`refusedPermissions`.During the development of code that emits dynamic assemblies, it is recommended that you use an overload of the method that specifies evidence and permissions, supply the evidence you want the dynamic assembly to have, and include in `refusedPermissions`. 其中包括在`refusedPermissions`参数可确保验证 MSIL。Including in the `refusedPermissions` parameter ensures that the MSIL is verified. 此技术的一个限制是，它还会导致与要求完全信任的代码一起使用时引发。A limitation of this technique is that it also causes to be thrown when used with code that demands full trust. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何方法和事件。The following sample demonstrates the method and event. 有关运行此代码示例，必须提供完全限定的程序集名称。For this code example to run, you must provide the fully qualified assembly name. 有关如何获取完全限定的程序集名称的信息，请参阅[程序集名称](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md)。For information about how to obtain the fully qualified assembly name, see [Assembly Names](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 为指定的权限请求`requiredPermissions`， `optionalPermissions`，和`refusedPermissions`不使用除非保存该动态程序集并将其重新加载到内存。The permission requests specified for `requiredPermissions`, `optionalPermissions`, and `refusedPermissions` are not used unless the dynamic assembly has been saved and reloaded into memory. 若要指定永远不会保存到磁盘中，使用的重载的瞬态程序集的权限请求方法，它指定证据和所请求的权限，并提供对象。To specify permission requests for a transient assembly that is never saved to disk, use an overload of the method that specifies evidence as well as requested permissions, and supply an object. > [!NOTE] > 在开发期间用于发出动态程序集的代码，建议你使用的重载方法，它指定证据和权限，提供你想要有，并且包含的动态程序集的证据中`refusedPermissions`.During the development of code that emits dynamic assemblies, it is recommended that you use an overload of the method that specifies evidence and permissions, supply the evidence you want the dynamic assembly to have, and include in `refusedPermissions`. 其中包括在`refusedPermissions`参数可确保验证 MSIL。Including in the `refusedPermissions` parameter ensures that the MSIL is verified. 此技术的一个限制是，它还会导致与要求完全信任的代码一起使用时引发。A limitation of this technique is that it also causes to be thrown when used with code that demands full trust. 此方法只应该用于当前应用程序域中定义动态程序集。This method should only be used to define a dynamic assembly in the current application domain. 有关详细信息，请参阅方法重载。For more information, see the method overload . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何方法和事件。The following sample demonstrates the method and event. 有关运行此代码示例，必须提供完全限定的程序集名称。For this code example to run, you must provide the fully qualified assembly name. 有关如何获取完全限定的程序集名称的信息，请参阅[程序集名称](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md)。For information about how to obtain the fully qualified assembly name, see [Assembly Names](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法重载来指定属性，除非在已应用创建动态程序集时，可能无法正常工作。Use this method overload to specify attributes that do not work correctly unless they are applied when a dynamic assembly is created. 例如，安全属性，如和即使添加了创建动态程序集后，可能无法正常工作。For example, security attributes such as and do not work correctly if they are added after a dynamic assembly has been created. 如果`isSynchronized`是`true`，生成的以下方法将同步： ， ， ， ， ，和。If `isSynchronized` is `true`, the following methods of the resulting will be synchronized: , , , , , and . 如果在不同的线程上调用这些方法的两个程序，一个将另完成之前一直阻止。If two of these methods are called on different threads, one will block until the other is completed.

summary.span: 使用指定名称、访问模式、证据和权限请求定义动态程序集。

span.span: Defines a dynamic assembly using the specified name, access mode, evidence, and permission requests.

returns.span: 具有指定名称和功能的动态程序集。

span.span: A dynamic assembly with the specified name and features.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为指定的权限请求`requiredPermissions`， `optionalPermissions`，并`refusedPermissions`才会使用`evidence`还提供，或如果动态程序集是保存和重新加载到内存。The permission requests specified for `requiredPermissions`, `optionalPermissions`, and `refusedPermissions` are used only if `evidence` is also supplied, or if the dynamic assembly is saved and reloaded into memory. > [!NOTE] > 在开发期间用于发出动态程序集的代码，建议您包含在`refusedPermissions`。During the development of code that emits dynamic assemblies, it is recommended that you include in `refusedPermissions`. 其中包括在`refusedPermissions`参数可确保验证 MSIL。Including in the `refusedPermissions` parameter ensures that the MSIL is verified. 此技术的一个限制是，它还会导致与要求完全信任的代码一起使用时引发。A limitation of this technique is that it also causes to be thrown when used with code that demands full trust. 只有完全受信任调用方可以提供其`evidence`定义动态时。Only fully trusted callers can supply their `evidence` when defining a dynamic . 在运行时将映射通过安全策略，以确定授予的权限。The runtime will map the through the security policy to determine the granted permissions. 部分受信任的调用方必须提供 null `evidence`。Partially trusted callers must supply a null `evidence`. 如果`evidence`是`null`，在运行时将复制的权限集，即，当前授予和拒绝集，从调用方的到动态正在定义，并将策略标记为已解决。If `evidence` is `null`, the runtime copies the permission sets, that is, the current grant and deny sets, from the caller's to the dynamic being defined and marks policy as resolved. 如果动态是保存到磁盘，后面的加载将获取基于与位置相关联的策略授予其中已保存。If the dynamic is saved to disk, subsequent loads will get grants based on policies associated with the location where the was saved. 此方法只应该用于当前应用程序域中定义动态程序集。This method should only be used to define a dynamic assembly in the current application domain. 有关详细信息，请参阅方法重载。For more information, see the method overload. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何方法和事件。The following sample demonstrates the method and event. 有关运行此代码示例，必须提供完全限定的程序集名称。For this code example to run, you must provide the fully qualified assembly name. 有关如何获取完全限定的程序集名称的信息，请参阅[程序集名称](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md)。For information about how to obtain the fully qualified assembly name, see [Assembly Names](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 为指定的权限请求`requiredPermissions`， `optionalPermissions`，并`refusedPermissions`才会使用`evidence`还提供，或如果动态程序集是保存和重新加载到内存。The permission requests specified for `requiredPermissions`, `optionalPermissions`, and `refusedPermissions` are used only if `evidence` is also supplied, or if the dynamic assembly is saved and reloaded into memory. > [!NOTE] > 在开发期间用于发出动态程序集的代码，建议您包含在`refusedPermissions`。During the development of code that emits dynamic assemblies, it is recommended that you include in `refusedPermissions`. 其中包括在`refusedPermissions`参数可确保验证 MSIL。Including in the `refusedPermissions` parameter ensures that the MSIL is verified. 此技术的一个限制是，它还会导致与要求完全信任的代码一起使用时引发。A limitation of this technique is that it also causes to be thrown when used with code that demands full trust. 只有完全受信任调用方可以提供其`evidence`定义动态时。Only fully trusted callers can supply their `evidence` when defining a dynamic . 在运行时将映射通过安全策略，以确定授予的权限。The runtime will map the through the security policy to determine the granted permissions. 部分受信任的调用方必须提供 null `evidence`。Partially trusted callers must supply a null `evidence`. 如果`evidence`是`null`，在运行时将复制的权限集，即，当前授予和拒绝集，从调用方的到动态正在定义，并将策略标记为已解决。If `evidence` is `null`, the runtime copies the permission sets, that is, the current grant and deny sets, from the caller's to the dynamic being defined and marks policy as resolved. 如果动态是保存到磁盘，后面的加载将获取基于与位置相关联的策略授予其中已保存。If the dynamic is saved to disk, subsequent loads will get grants based on policies associated with the location where the was saved. 此方法只应该用于当前应用程序域中定义动态程序集。This method should only be used to define a dynamic assembly in the current application domain. 有关详细信息，请参阅方法重载。For more information, see the method overload. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何方法和事件。The following sample demonstrates the method and event. 有关运行此代码示例，必须提供完全限定的程序集名称。For this code example to run, you must provide the fully qualified assembly name. 有关如何获取完全限定的程序集名称的信息，请参阅[程序集名称](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md)。For information about how to obtain the fully qualified assembly name, see [Assembly Names](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 为指定的权限请求`requiredPermissions`， `optionalPermissions`，并`refusedPermissions`才会使用`evidence`还提供，或如果动态程序集是保存和重新加载到内存。The permission requests specified for `requiredPermissions`, `optionalPermissions`, and `refusedPermissions` are used only if `evidence` is also supplied, or if the dynamic assembly is saved and reloaded into memory. > [!NOTE] > 在开发期间用于发出动态程序集的代码，建议您包含在`refusedPermissions`。During the development of code that emits dynamic assemblies, it is recommended that you include in `refusedPermissions`. 其中包括在`refusedPermissions`参数可确保验证 MSIL。Including in the `refusedPermissions` parameter ensures that the MSIL is verified. 此技术的一个限制是，它还会导致与要求完全信任的代码一起使用时引发。A limitation of this technique is that it also causes to be thrown when used with code that demands full trust. 只有完全受信任调用方可以提供其证据定义动态时。Only fully trusted callers can supply their evidence when defining a dynamic . 在运行时将映射通过安全策略，以确定授予的权限。The runtime will map the through the security policy to determine the granted permissions. 部分受信任的调用方必须提供`null`为`evidence`参数。Partially trusted callers must supply `null` for the `evidence` parameter. 如果`evidence`是`null`，在运行时将复制的权限集，即，当前授予和拒绝集，从调用方的到动态正在定义，并将策略标记为已解决。If `evidence` is `null`, the runtime copies the permission sets, that is, the current grant and deny sets, from the caller's to the dynamic being defined and marks policy as resolved. 如果动态是保存到磁盘，后面的加载将获取基于与位置相关联的策略授予其中已保存。If the dynamic is saved to disk, subsequent loads will get grants based on policies associated with the location where the was saved. 如果`isSynchronized`是`true`，生成的以下方法将同步： ， ， ， ， ，和。If `isSynchronized` is `true`, the following methods of the resulting will be synchronized: , , , , , and . 如果在不同的线程上调用这些方法的两个程序，一个将其他完成之前一直阻止。If two of these methods are called on different threads, one will block until the other completes. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何方法和事件。The following sample demonstrates the method and event. 有关运行此代码示例，必须提供完全限定的程序集名称。For this code example to run, you must provide the fully qualified assembly name. 有关如何获取完全限定的程序集名称的信息，请参阅[程序集名称](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md)。For information about how to obtain the fully qualified assembly name, see [Assembly Names](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法重载来指定属性，除非在已应用创建动态程序集时，可能无法正常工作。Use this method overload to specify attributes that do not work correctly unless they are applied when a dynamic assembly is created. 例如，安全属性，如和即使添加了创建动态程序集后，可能无法正常工作。For example, security attributes such as and do not work correctly if they are added after a dynamic assembly has been created. 为指定的权限请求`requiredPermissions`， `optionalPermissions`，并`refusedPermissions`参数才会使用`evidence`还提供参数，或如果动态程序集是保存和重新加载到内存。The permission requests specified for the `requiredPermissions`, `optionalPermissions`, and `refusedPermissions` parameters are used only if the `evidence` parameter is also supplied, or if the dynamic assembly is saved and reloaded into memory. > [!NOTE] > 开发时发出动态程序集的代码，我们建议您包括标记中`refusedPermissions`参数。When you develop code that emits dynamic assemblies, we recommend that you include the flag in the `refusedPermissions` parameter. 包含此标志可确保的 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 将进行验证。The inclusion of this flag ensures that the Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) will be verified. 此方法会检测无意间生成不可验证的代码，否则为这是很难检测到。This technique will detect the unintentional generation of unverifiable code, which otherwise is very difficult to detect. 此技术的一个限制是，它还会导致要求完全信任的代码中使用它时引发。A limitation of this technique is that it also causes to be thrown when it is used with code that demands full trust. 只有完全受信任调用方可以提供证据定义动态时。Only fully trusted callers can supply evidence when defining a dynamic . 运行时将映射通过安全策略，以确定授予的权限。The runtime maps the through the security policy to determine the granted permissions. 部分受信任的调用方必须提供`null`为`evidence`参数。Partially trusted callers must supply `null` for the `evidence` parameter. 如果`evidence`是`null`，运行时将从调用方的程序集的权限集 （即，当前授予和拒绝集） 复制到正在定义中，并将策略标记为已解决的动态程序集。If `evidence` is `null`, the runtime copies the permission sets (that is, the current grant and deny sets) from the caller's assembly to the dynamic assembly that is being defined, and marks the policy as resolved. 如果动态程序集保存到磁盘，后续加载会授予基于与保存动态程序集的位置相关联的策略。If the dynamic assembly is saved to disk, subsequent loads will get grants based on policies that are associated with the location where the dynamic assembly was saved. 如果`isSynchronized`是`true`，生成的以下方法将同步： ， ， ， ， ，和。If `isSynchronized` is `true`, the following methods of the resulting will be synchronized: , , , , , and . 如果在不同的线程上调用这些方法的两个程序，一个将另完成之前一直阻止。If two of these methods are called on different threads, one will block until the other is completed. 中引入了此方法重载[!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]。This method overload is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)].

summary.span: 获得初始化应用程序域时主机提供的域管理器。

span.span: Gets the domain manager that was provided by the host when the application domain was initialized.

value.span: 一个对象，表示初始化应用程序域时主机提供的域管理器；或者如果没有提供域管理器，则返回 。

span.span: An object that represents the domain manager provided by the host when the application domain was initialized, or if no domain manager was provided.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公共语言运行时 (CLR) 的非托管的主机可以提供域管理器。An unmanaged host of the common language runtime (CLR) can provide a domain manager. 域管理器可以参与初始化新的应用程序域并提供其他管理器，如，该元素参与应用程序域的操作。The domain manager can participate in initializing the new application domain and supply other managers, such as a , that participate in the operations of the application domain.

span.span: Requires full trust for the immediate caller.

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.

.event class System.EventHandler DomainUnload
Public Custom Event DomainUnload As EventHandler
public: virtual event EventHandler ^ DomainUnload;
member this.DomainUnload : EventHandler

summary.span: 在即将卸载 时发生。

span.span: Occurs when an is about to be unloaded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 委托卸载应用程序域之前，此事件可以执行任何终止活动。The delegate for this event can perform any termination activities before the application domain is unloaded. 需要对其执行处理卸载时每个应用程序域应注册此事件的事件处理程序。Each application domain that needs to perform processing when it is unloaded should register an event handler for this event. 共享的事件处理程序不应使用，因为委托将无法识别的域正在卸载模块。A shared event handler should not be used, because the delegate does not identify the domain that is being unloaded. > [!NOTE] > 默认应用程序域中永远不会引发此事件。This event is never raised in the default application domain. 不进行有关线程引发事件的假设。Do not make assumptions about the thread the event is raised on. 可以在比调用不同的线程上引发该事件方法。The event can be raised on a different thread than the one that called the method. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

span.span: The directory that the assembly resolver uses to probe for dynamically created assemblies.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要设置的动态目录，将分配到的基目录路径属性的将用于创建新的应用程序域的对象。To set the dynamic directory, assign a base directory path to the property of the object that will be used to create the new application domain. 通过简单名称是将分配到的字符串的哈希代码子目录添加修改分配给属性的基目录路径属性，因此在基目录的格式是*原始路径* \\*哈希代码*。The base directory path you assign to the property is modified by the addition of a subdirectory whose simple name is the hash code of the string you assign to the property, so the format of the base directory is *original path*\\*hash code*. 动态目录是此基目录的子目录。The dynamic directory is a subdirectory of this base directory. 其简单的名称为的值属性，因此其格式是*原始路径*\\*哈希代码*\\*应用程序名称*。Its simple name is the value of the property, so its format is *original path*\\*hash code*\\*application name*. ## Examples 下面的示例创建与目录的动态程序集的应用程序域、 发出动态程序集并将其存储在动态目录中，将程序集加载到新的应用程序域并使用它。The following example creates an application domain with a directory for dynamic assemblies, emits a dynamic assembly and stores it in the dynamic directory, and then loads the assembly into the new application domain and uses it. 此示例将创建对象并设置其属性设置为"示例"并将其属性设置为"C:\DynamicAssemblyDir"。The example creates an object and sets its property to "Example" and its property to "C:\DynamicAssemblyDir". 该示例然后显示属性，以显示应用程序名称的哈希代码具有已追加为最初分配的路径的子目录。The example then displays the property, to show that the hash code of the application name has been appended as a subdirectory of the path that was originally assigned. > [!NOTE] > 在此示例中的基目录被用于示例应用程序位于探测路径外部。The base directory in this example is intended to be outside the probing path for the example application. 请确保编译中的其他位置的示例。Be sure to compile the example in a different location. 每次运行该示例删除在基目录及其所有的子目录。Delete the base directory and all its subdirectories each time you run the example. 该示例创建一个新的应用程序域，使用对象。The example creates a new application domain, using the object. 该示例使用属性检索的目录的名称，因此它可以创建目录。The example uses the property to retrieve the name of the directory, so it can create the directory. （该示例可以轻松地创建目录事先通过连接的原始路径、 应用程序名称和应用程序名称的哈希代码。）(The example could just as easily create the directory beforehand by concatenating the original path, the hash code of the application name, and the application name.) 本示例具有`GenerateDynamicAssembly`方法发出的程序集名为`DynamicHelloWorld.dll`并将其存储在新应用程序域的动态目录。The example has a `GenerateDynamicAssembly` method that emits an assembly named `DynamicHelloWorld.dll` and stores it in the new application domain's dynamic directory. 动态程序集包含一种类型， `HelloWorld`，具有一个静态方法 (`Shared`方法在 Visual Basic 中的) 名为`HelloFromAD`。The dynamic assembly contains one type, `HelloWorld`, that has a static method (`Shared` method in Visual Basic) named `HelloFromAD`. 调用此方法显示应用程序域的名称。Calling this method displays the name of the application domain. `Example`类派生自，因此该示例可以创建类的实例中，新应用程序域并调用其`Test`方法。The `Example` class derives from , so the example can create an instance of the class in the new application domain and call its `Test` method. `Test`方法加载的动态程序集按其显示名称，并调用静态`HelloFromAD`方法。The `Test` method loads the dynamic assembly by its display name and calls the static `HelloFromAD` method. 可以显示后正常的探测路径搜索动态目录，通过编写代码的名为程序集`DynamicHelloWorld.dll`并将其编译为此示例中的相同目录中。You can show that the dynamic directory is searched after the normal probing paths by writing code for an assembly named `DynamicHelloWorld.dll` and compiling it in the same directory as this example. 程序集必须具有一个名为类`HelloWorld`与名为静态方法`HelloFromAD`。The assembly must have a class named `HelloWorld` with a static method named `HelloFromAD`. 此方法不需要具有相同的功能中这些示例。它可以只需将字符串显示到控制台。This method does not have to have the same functionality as the one in the example; it can simply display a string to the console. 程序集还必须具有设置其版本为 1.0.0.0 的属性。The assembly must also have an attribute that sets its version to 1.0.0.0. 运行示例时，动态目录中搜索之前，找到在当前目录中编译的程序集。When you run the example, the assembly you compiled in the current directory is found before the dynamic directory is searched. [!code-cpp[ADDynamicBase#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADDynamicBase/CPP/addynamicbase.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ADDynamicBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADDynamicBase/CS/addynamicbase.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ADDynamicBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADDynamicBase/VB/addynamicbase.vb#1)]

param.span: 为程序集提供的证据。

span.span: The supplied evidence for the assembly.

span.span: Represents the hash algorithm used by the assembly manifest.

summary.span: 使用指定的证据、自变量、哈希值和哈希算法执行指定文件中包含的程序集。

span.span: Executes the assembly contained in the specified file, using the specified evidence, arguments, hash value, and hash algorithm.

returns.span: 程序集的入口点返回的值。

span.span: The value returned by the entry point of the assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 程序集开始在.NET Framework 标头中指定的入口点执行。The assembly begins executing at the entry point specified in the .NET Framework header. 此方法不会创建新的进程或应用程序域，并且它不在新线程上执行的入口点方法。This method does not create a new process or application domain, and it does not execute the entry point method on a new thread. 此方法加载程序集使用方法。This method loads assemblies using the method. 此外可以执行使用的程序集方法，加载程序集使用方法。You can also execute assemblies using the method, which loads assemblies using the method. ## Examples 以下示例演示如何使用的重载之一在两个不同的域。Thefollowing sample demonstrates using one of the overloads of on two different domains. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法提供了与类似的功能方法，但指定的程序集的显示名称或而不是按文件位置。The method provides similar functionality to the method, but specifies the assembly by display name or rather than by file location. 因此，加载的程序集方法而不是与方法。Therefore, loads assemblies with the method rather than with the method. 程序集开始在.NET Framework 标头中指定的入口点执行。The assembly begins executing at the entry point specified in the .NET Framework header. 此方法不会创建新的进程或应用程序域，并且它不在新线程上执行的入口点方法。This method does not create a new process or application domain, and it does not execute the entry point method on a new thread. 若要创建若要加载并执行，请使用方法。To create the to load and execute, use the method.

span.span: Executes the assembly given its display name, using the specified evidence and arguments.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法提供了与类似的功能方法，但指定的程序集的显示名称或而不是按文件位置。The method provides similar functionality to the method, but specifies the assembly by display name or rather than by file location. 因此，加载的程序集方法而不是与方法。Therefore, loads assemblies with the method rather than with the method. 程序集开始在.NET Framework 标头中指定的入口点执行。The assembly begins executing at the entry point specified in the .NET Framework header. 此方法不会创建新的进程或应用程序域，并且它不在新线程上执行的入口点方法。This method does not create a new process or application domain, and it does not execute the entry point method on a new thread. > [!NOTE] > 当你使用方法替换参数，证据进行合并。When you use the method with an parameter, pieces of evidence are merged. 作为参数提供的证据方法取代加载程序提供的证据。Pieces of evidence supplied as an argument to the method supersede pieces of evidence supplied by the loader.

.event class System.EventHandler`1<class System.Runtime.ExceptionServices.FirstChanceExceptionEventArgs> FirstChanceException
Public Custom Event FirstChanceException As EventHandler(Of FirstChanceExceptionEventArgs)
public: event EventHandler<System::Runtime::ExceptionServices::FirstChanceExceptionEventArgs ^> ^ FirstChanceException;
member this.FirstChanceException : EventHandler<System.Runtime.ExceptionServices.FirstChanceExceptionEventArgs>

summary.span: 当托管代码抛出异常时发生，在运行时在调用堆栈中搜索应用程序域中的异常处理程序之前。

span.span: Occurs when an exception is thrown in managed code, before the runtime searches the call stack for an exception handler in the application domain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件只是一个通知。This event is only a notification. 处理此事件不处理该异常也会影响后续异常以任何方式处理。Handling this event does not handle the exception or affect subsequent exception handling in any way. 引发该事件并在调用事件处理程序后，公共语言运行时 (CLR) 开始搜索异常处理程序。After the event has been raised and event handlers have been invoked, the common language runtime (CLR) begins to search for a handler for the exception. 第一次机会检查任何托管的异常中提供的应用程序域。 provides the application domain with a first chance to examine any managed exception. 可以针对每个应用程序域处理此事件。The event can be handled per application domain. 如果一个线程在执行调用时通过多个应用程序域，CLR 开始搜索匹配的异常处理程序在该应用程序域之前已注册事件处理程序，每个应用程序域中引发事件。If a thread passes through multiple application domains while executing a call, the event is raised in each application domain that has registered an event handler, before the CLR begins searching for a matching exception handler in that application domain. 处理该事件后，为该应用程序域中匹配的异常处理程序进行搜索。After the event has been handled, a search is made for a matching exception handler in that application domain. 如果找不到下, 一步的应用程序域中引发事件。If none is found, the event is raised in the next application domain. 必须处理发生在事件处理程序的所有异常事件。You must handle all exceptions that occur in the event handler for the event. 否则为引发以递归方式。Otherwise, is raised recursively. 这可能导致堆栈溢出和终止应用程序。This could result in a stack overflow and termination of the application. 我们建议你实现此事件的事件处理程序为受约束的执行区域 (Cer)，以防止与基础结构相关的异常，例如内存不足或堆栈溢出异常通知时，会影响虚拟机正在处理。We recommend that you implement event handlers for this event as constrained execution regions (CERs), to keep infrastructure-related exceptions such as out-of-memory or stack overflow from affecting the virtual machine while the exception notification is being processed. 此事件不引发的异常指示损坏进程状态，例如，访问冲突，除非事件处理程序是安全关键的并且具有属性。This event is not raised for exceptions that indicate corruption of process state, such as access violations, unless the event handler is security-critical and has the attribute. 正在处理此通知事件时，公共语言运行时将挂起线程中止。The common language runtime suspends thread aborts while this notification event is being handled. ## Examples 下面的示例创建名为应用程序域的一系列`AD0`通过`AD3`，使用`Worker`每个应用程序域中的对象。The following example creates a series of application domains named `AD0` through `AD3`, with a `Worker` object in each application domain. 每个`Worker`对象具有对引用`Worker`对象在下一步的应用程序域中，除`Worker`最后一个应用程序域中。Each `Worker` object has a reference to the `Worker` object in the next application domain, except for the `Worker` in the last application domain. 以外的所有应用程序域中处理事件`AD1`。The event is handled in all application domains except `AD1`. > [!NOTE] > 除了此示例中，该示例演示了多个应用程序域中的第一次异常通知，您可以发现中的简单用例[如何： 接收首次异常通知](~/docs/framework/app-domains/how-to-receive-first-chance-exception-notifications.md)。In addition to this example, which demonstrates first-chance exception notifications in multiple application domains, you can find simple use cases in [How to: Receive First-Chance Exception Notifications](~/docs/framework/app-domains/how-to-receive-first-chance-exception-notifications.md). 当已创建应用程序域时，默认应用程序域调用`TestException`方法的第一个应用程序域。When the application domains have been created, the default application domain calls the `TestException` method for the first application domain. 每个`Worker`对象调用`TestException`方法下一步的应用程序域，直到最后一个`Worker`引发的异常处理的或未经处理的。Each `Worker` object calls the `TestException` method for the next application domain, until the last `Worker` throws an exception that is either handled or unhandled. 因此，当前线程通过所有应用程序域和`TestException`添加到每个应用程序域中的堆栈。Thus, the current thread passes through all the application domains, and `TestException` is added to the stack in each application domain. 当最后一个`Worker`对象处理异常，仅在最后一个应用程序域中引发事件。When the last `Worker` object handles the exception, the event is raised only in the last application domain. 其他应用程序域永远不会有机会处理异常，因此不会引发事件。The other application domains never get a chance to handle the exception, so the event is not raised. 当最后一个`Worker`对象不处理异常，具有事件处理程序的每个应用程序域中引发事件。When the last `Worker` object does not handle the exception, the event is raised in each application domain that has an event handler. 每个事件处理程序完成后，堆栈将继续展开，直到通过默认应用程序域中捕获的异常。After each event handler has finished, the stack continues to unwind until the exception is caught by the default application domain. > [!NOTE] > 若要查看堆栈显示如更接近引发该事件的增长和更接近于默认应用程序域，请更改`e.Exception.Message`到`e.Exception`中`FirstChanceHandler`事件处理程序。To see how the stack display grows as the event is raised closer and closer to the default application domain, change `e.Exception.Message` to `e.Exception` in the `FirstChanceHandler` event handlers. 请注意，当`TestException`调用跨应用程序域边界，它会出现两次： 一次为代理和存根 （stub） 的一次。Notice that when `TestException` is called across application domain boundaries, it appears twice: once for the proxy and once for the stub. [!code-csharp[System.AppDomain.FirstChanceException#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.appdomain.firstchanceexception/cs/example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.AppDomain.FirstChanceException#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.appdomain.firstchanceexception/vb/example.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认应用程序域的友好名称是进程可执行文件的文件名。The friendly name of the default application domain is the file name of the process executable. 例如，如果用于启动进程可执行文件是`"c:\MyAppDirectory\MyAssembly.exe"`，默认应用程序域的友好名称是`"MyAssembly.exe"`。For example, if the executable used to start the process is `"c:\MyAppDirectory\MyAssembly.exe"`, the friendly name of the default application domain is `"MyAssembly.exe"`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性来获取当前应用程序域的友好名称。The following code example uses the property to get the friendly name of the current application domain. 对于默认应用程序域，友好名称是应用程序的可执行文件的名称。For the default application domain, the friendly name is the name of the application's executable file. 代码示例还显示有关应用程序域的其他信息。The code example also displays additional information about the application domain. remarks.format:
## Remarks 此方法用于检索名称数据对描述此实例的属性的内部缓存中的条目的值。Use this method to retrieve the value of an entry in an internal cache of name-data pairs that describe properties of this instance of . 请注意，比较`name`键-值对的名称是区分大小写。Note that the comparison of `name` with the name of key-value pairs is case-sensitive. 该缓存自动包含预定义的系统项的创建应用程序域时插入。The cache automatically contains predefined system entries that are inserted when the application domain is created. 您可以检查它们的值与方法或等效属性。You can inspect their values with the method, or the equivalent properties. 可以插入或修改与自己用户定义名称数据对方法，并检查其值与方法。You can insert or modify your own user defined name-data pairs with the method and inspect their values with the method. 下表描述了`name`每个预定义的系统入口和其对应属性。The following table describes the `name` of each predefined system entry and its corresponding property. |Name 的值Value of 'name'|PropertyProperty| |---------------------|--------------| |"APPBASE""APPBASE"|| |"APP_CONFIG_FILE""APP_CONFIG_FILE"|| |"APP_LAUNCH_URL""APP_LAUNCH_URL"|（无属性）(no property)

"APP_LAUNCH_URL"表示之前的任何重定向,，用户最初请求的 URL。"APP_LAUNCH_URL" represents the URL originally requested by the user, before any redirection. 仅当已使用 Internet Explorer 等浏览器启动了应用程序时，它是可用。It is available only when the application has been launched with a browser such as Internet Explorer. 并非所有浏览器提供此值。Not all browsers provide this value.| |"A P P _""APP_NAME"|| |"BINPATH_PROBE_ONLY""BINPATH_PROBE_ONLY"|| |"CACHE_BASE""CACHE_BASE"|| |"CODE_DOWNLOAD_DISABLED""CODE_DOWNLOAD_DISABLED"|| |"DEV_PATH""DEV_PATH"|（无属性）(no property)| |"DISALLOW_APP""DISALLOW_APP"|| |"DISALLOW_APP_BASE_PROBING""DISALLOW_APP_BASE_PROBING"|| |"DISALLOW_APP_REDIRECTS""DISALLOW_APP_REDIRECTS"|| |"DYNAMIC_BASE""DYNAMIC_BASE"|| |"FORCE_CACHE_INSTALL""FORCE_CACHE_INSTALL"|| |"LICENSE_FILE"或特定于应用程序的字符串"LICENSE_FILE", or an application-specific string|| |"LOADER_OPTIMIZATION""LOADER_OPTIMIZATION"|| |"LOCATION_URI""LOCATION_URI"|（无属性）(no property)| |"PRIVATE_BINPATH""PRIVATE_BINPATH"|| |"REGEX_DEFAULT_MATCH_TIMEOUT""REGEX_DEFAULT_MATCH_TIMEOUT"|

"REGEX_DEFAULT_MATCH_TIMEOUT"不是系统条目，并且其值可通过调用设置方法。"REGEX_DEFAULT_MATCH_TIMEOUT" is not a system entry, and its value can be set by calling the method.| |"SHADOW_COPY_DIRS""SHADOW_COPY_DIRS"|| ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个新的应用程序域，设置在域中的系统提供值并将域的新值对。The following example creates a new application domain, sets a system-provided value for the domain, and adds a new value pair for the domain. 该示例然后演示如何使用方法以从这些值对检索数据并将其显示到控制台。The example then demonstrates how to use the method to retrieve the data from these value pairs and display them to the console. [!code-cpp[ADGetData#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADGetData/CPP/adgetdata.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ADGetData#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADGetData/CS/adgetdata.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ADGetData#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADGetData/VB/adgetdata.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法测试是否已为当前应用程序域中设置指定兼容性开关。This method tests whether the specified compatibility switch has been set for the current application domain. 兼容性开关通常还原行为 （例如，字符串的方式进行排序） 的.NET Framework 版本之间已更改。Compatibility switches typically restore a behavior (such as the way strings are sorted) that was changed between versions of the .NET Framework. 它们由调用设置方法，然后再创建一个应用程序域。They are set by calling the method before creating an application domain. 下表提供了兼容性开关，可设置为还原的早期版本的.NET Framework 的行为的示例。The following table provides examples of compatibility switches that can be set to restore the behavior of earlier versions of the .NET Framework. |开关Switch|含义Meaning| |------------|-------------| |"NetFx40_LegacySecurityPolicy""NetFx40_LegacySecurityPolicy"|有关代码访问安全性 (CAS)[!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)]启用此应用程序域中。Code access security (CAS) for the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)] is enabled in this application domain. 请参阅[ <NetFx40_LegacySecurityPolicy>元素](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/netfx40-legacysecuritypolicy-element.md)。See [<NetFx40_LegacySecurityPolicy> Element](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/netfx40-legacysecuritypolicy-element.md).| |"NetFx40_Legacy20SortingBehavior""NetFx40_Legacy20SortingBehavior"|字符串排序的默认值[!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)]在此应用程序域中启用。String sorting defaults for the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)] are enabled in this application domain. 它成功要求 sort00001000.dll 安装。Its success requires sort00001000.dll to be installed. 请参阅[ <CompatSortNLSVersion>元素](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/compatsortnlsversion-element.md)。See [<CompatSortNLSVersion> Element](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/compatsortnlsversion-element.md).| |"NetFx40_Legacy40SortingBehavior""NetFx40_Legacy40SortingBehavior"|字符串排序的默认值[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]，并且在此应用程序域中启用 Unicode 5.0。String sorting defaults for the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]and Unicode 5.0 are enabled in this application domain. 它成功需要 sort00060101.dll 安装。Its success requires sort00060101.dll to be installed.| |"NetFx40_TimeSpanLegacyFormatMode""NetFx40_TimeSpanLegacyFormatMode"| 格式设置行为的[!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)]启用此应用程序域中。 formatting behavior for the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)] is enabled in this application domain. 请参阅[ <TimeSpan_LegacyFormatMode>元素](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/timespan-legacyformatmode-element.md)和"还原旧版 TimeSpan 格式设置"部分的主题。See [<TimeSpan_LegacyFormatMode> Element](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/timespan-legacyformatmode-element.md) and the "Restoring Legacy TimeSpan Formatting" section of the topic.| |"UseRandomizedStringHashAlgorithm""UseRandomizedStringHashAlgorithm"|在运行时计算字符串的哈希代码对每个应用程序域而不是使用跨应用程序域生成一致的哈希代码的单个哈希算法。The runtime calculates hash codes for strings on a per application domain basis instead of using a single hashing algorithm that produces a consistent hash code across application domains. 请参阅[ <userandomizedstringhashalgorithm，那么>元素](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/userandomizedstringhashalgorithm-element.md)。See [<UseRandomizedStringHashAlgorithm> Element](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/userandomizedstringhashalgorithm-element.md).|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个托管的进程都有一个默认应用程序域。Every managed process has a default application domain. 默认域中开始执行。Execution begins in the default domain. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建第二个应用程序域，并显示的默认域和新的域有关的信息。The following code example creates a second application domain and displays information about the default domain and the new domain. summary.span: 指示此应用程序域是否正在卸载以及公共语言运行时是否正在终止该域包含的对象。

span.span: Indicates whether this application domain is unloading, and the objects it contains are being finalized by the common language runtime.

returns.span: 如果此应用程序域正在卸载，并且公共语言运行时已开始调用终止程序，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if this application domain is unloading and the common language runtime has started invoking finalizers; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个对象的完成方法提供该对象进行垃圾回收之前执行任何必要的清理操作的机会。The finalization method for an object provides you an opportunity to perform any necessary cleanup operations before the object is garbage collected. 完成后，该对象处于可访问，但处于无效状态，因而无法使用。After finalization, the object is accessible but in an invalid state and therefore unusable. 最终，垃圾回收完成，并回收对象。Eventually, garbage collection completes and reclaims the object. 在以下情况之一调用对象的完成方法： 垃圾回收期间时公共语言运行时关闭或卸载应用程序域包含的对象时。An object's finalization method is called in one of the following situations: during garbage collection, when the common language runtime is shutting down, or when the application domain that contains the object is unloaded. 方法将返回`true`仅在最后一种情况; 它不返回`true`终止结果从常规垃圾回收或 CLR 关闭时。The method returns `true` only in the last case; it does not return `true` if finalization results from routine garbage collection or from CLR shutdown. > [!NOTE] > 若要确定是否由于 CLR 关闭完成，请使用属性。To determine whether finalization is due to CLR shutdown, use the property. 它将返回`true`终止是否由于应用程序域正在卸载或者 CLR 正在关闭。It returns `true` if finalization is due to an application domain being unloaded or to the CLR shutting down. 执行时完成方法域卸载期间，你可能想要访问引用的静态字段和已完成方法的另一个对象。While executing in your finalization method during domain unloading, you might want to access another object that is referenced by a static field and has a finalization method. 但是，您不能可靠地这样做，因为访问的对象可能已完成。However, you cannot reliably do so because the accessed object might already have been finalized. > [!NOTE] > 此规则的例外是类，该类包含引用流对象的静态字段，但比较特殊，以便可以始终写入系统控制台中，即使在域卸载或系统关闭期间实现。An exception to this rule is the class, which contains static fields that reference stream objects, but is implemented specially so you can always write to the system console, even during domain unloading or system shutdown. 对象的完成方法中使用此方法，以确定是否正在卸载应用程序域包含的对象。Use this method in an object's finalization method to determine whether the application domain that contains the object is unloading. 如果是这种情况，不能可靠地访问任何已完成方法，并由静态字段引用对象。If that is the case, you cannot reliably access any object that has a finalization method and is referenced by a static field.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示加载到当前应用程序域的程序集是否是以完全信任方式执行的。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether assemblies that are loaded into the current application domain execute with full trust.

value.span: 如果加载到当前应用程序域的程序集是以完全信任方式执行的，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if assemblies that are loaded into the current application domain execute with full trust; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法始终返回`true`在桌面上运行的应用程序的默认应用程序域。This method always returns `true` for the default application domain of an application that runs on the desktop. 它将返回`false`已通过使用为沙盒应用程序域方法重载，除非应用程序域授予的权限是等效于完全信任。It returns `false` for a sandboxed application domain that was created by using the method overload, unless the permissions that are granted to the application domain are equivalent to full trust. ## Examples 下面的示例演示属性和具有完全受信任和部分受信任的应用程序域的属性。The following example demonstrates the property and the property with fully trusted and partially trusted application domains. 完全受信任的应用程序域是应用程序的默认应用程序域。The fully trusted application domain is the default application domain for the application. 通过创建部分受信任的应用程序域方法重载。The partially trusted application domain is created by using the method overload. 该示例使用`Worker`派生的类，因此它可以跨应用程序域边界封送。The example uses a `Worker` class that derives from , so it can be marshaled across application domain boundaries. 此示例将创建`Worker`默认应用程序域中的对象。The example creates a `Worker` object in the default application domain. 然后，它调用`TestIsFullyTrusted`方法以显示属性值为应用程序域和加载到应用程序域的两个程序集： mscorlib 除外，它是.NET Framework 中，并将示例程序集的一部分。It then calls the `TestIsFullyTrusted` method to display the property value for the application domain and for two assemblies that are loaded into the application domain: mscorlib, which is part of the .NET Framework, and the example assembly. 应用程序域是完全受信任的因此这两个程序集是完全受信任。The application domain is fully trusted, so both assemblies are fully trusted. 该示例将创建另一个`Worker`对象在沙盒应用程序域并再次调用`TestIsFullyTrusted`方法。The example creates another `Worker` object in a sandboxed application domain and again calls the `TestIsFullyTrusted` method. Mscorlib 始终受信任的甚至在部分受信任的应用程序域中，但示例程序集是部分受信任。Mscorlib is always trusted, even in a partially trusted application domain, but the example assembly is partially trusted. [!code-csharp[System.AppDomain.IsFullyTrusted#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.appdomain.isfullytrusted/cs/example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.AppDomain.IsFullyTrusted#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.appdomain.isfullytrusted/vb/example.vb#1)]

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the current application domain has a set of permissions that is granted to all assemblies that are loaded into the application domain.

value.span: 如果当前应用程序域具有一组同构权限，则为 ；否则，为 。

span.span: if the current application domain has a homogenous set of permissions; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回`true`使用创建的沙盒应用程序域方法重载。This property returns `true` for sandboxed application domains that were created by using the method overload. 沙盒应用程序域具有一组同构权限;即，相同的权限集授予的所有部分受信任程序集加载到应用程序域。Sandboxed application domains have a homogenous set of permissions; that is, the same set of permissions is granted to all partially trusted assemblies that are loaded into the application domain. 沙盒应用程序域 （可选） 有强名称的程序集设置，并改为使用完全信任运行此权限不受约束的列表。A sandboxed application domain optionally has a list of strong-named assemblies that are exempt from this permission set, and instead run with full trust. 完全受信任的代码可以使用属性来确定沙盒应用程序域的同构的授予集。Fully trusted code can use the property to determine the homogenous grant set of a sandboxed application domain. 此属性也会返回`true`的默认应用程序域的桌面应用程序，因为该应用程序域将为所有程序集授予完全信任。This property also returns `true` for the default application domain of a desktop application, because that application domain grants full trust to all assemblies.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法应仅用于将程序集加载到当前应用程序域。This method should be used only to load an assembly into the current application domain. 不能调用静态的互操作性调用方为方便起见提供此方法是方法。This method is provided as a convenience for interoperability callers who cannot call the static method. 若要将程序集加载到其他应用程序域中，使用一种方法如。To load assemblies into other application domains, use a method such as . 如果已加载请求的程序集的版本，则此方法返回加载的程序集，即使要求不同版本。If a version of the requested assembly is already loaded, this method returns the loaded assembly, even if a different version is requested. 提供的部分程序集名称`assemblyRef`不建议。Supplying a partial assembly name for `assemblyRef` is not recommended. （一个或多个区域性、 版本或公钥标记，则省略了部分名称。(A partial name omits one or more of culture, version, or public key token. 对于采用字符串而不是重载对象，"MyAssembly，版本 = 1.0.0.0"是一个示例部分的名称和"MyAssembly，版本 = 1.0.0.0，区域性 = neutral，PublicKeyToken = 18ab3442da84b47"是一个示例的完整名称。)使用部分名称具有负面影响性能。For overloads that take a string instead of an object, "MyAssembly, Version=1.0.0.0" is an example of a partial name and "MyAssembly, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=18ab3442da84b47" is an example of a full name.) Using partial names has a negative effect on performance. 此外，部分程序集名称可以加载程序集从全局程序集缓存才应用程序基目录中的程序集的一个精确副本 (或)。In addition, a partial assembly name can load an assembly from the global assembly cache only if there is an exact copy of the assembly in the application base directory ( or ). 如果当前对象表示应用程序域`A`，并方法从应用程序域调用`B`，该程序集被加载到这两个应用程序域。If the current object represents application domain `A`, and the method is called from application domain `B`, the assembly is loaded into both application domains. 例如，下面的代码加载`MyAssembly`到新的应用程序域`ChildDomain`还到应用程序域执行的代码：For example, the following code loads `MyAssembly` into the new application domain `ChildDomain` and also into the application domain where the code executes: [!code-cpp[System.AppDomain.Load#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.appdomain.load/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.AppDomain.Load#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.appdomain.load/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.AppDomain.Load#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.appdomain.load/vb/source.vb#1)] 程序集加载到这两个域，因为不是派生自，并因此返回值的方法不能进行封送处理。The assembly is loaded into both domains because does not derive from , and therefore the return value of the method cannot be marshaled. 相反，公共语言运行时尝试将该程序集加载到调用应用程序域。Instead, the common language runtime tries to load the assembly into the calling application domain. 加载到两个应用程序域的程序集可能是不同的两个应用程序域的路径设置是否不同。The assemblies that are loaded into the two application domains might be different if the path settings for the two application domains are different. > [!NOTE] > 如果这两个属性和属性设置，第一次尝试加载程序集使用的显示名称 (包括版本、 区域性和等等，所返回的属性)。If both the property and the property are set, the first attempt to load the assembly uses the display name (including version, culture, and so on, as returned by the property). 如果找不到该文件，属性用来搜索该程序集。If the file is not found, the property is used to search for the assembly. 如果使用找到的程序集，与程序集匹配的显示名称。If the assembly is found using , the display name is matched against the assembly. 如果匹配失败，引发。If the match fails, a is thrown.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否对当前进程启用应用程序域的 CPU 和内存监视。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether CPU and memory monitoring of application domains is enabled for the current process.

summary.span: 一旦对进程启用了监视，则无法将其禁用。

span.span: Once monitoring is enabled for a process, it cannot be disabled.

value.span: 如果启用监视，则为 ；否则为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这`static`属性 (`Shared`属性在 Visual Basic) 控制 CPU 和内存监视的进程中的所有应用程序域。This `static` property (`Shared` property in Visual Basic) controls CPU and memory monitoring of all the application domains in the process. 如果尝试将此属性设置为`false`、 一个引发异常，即使该属性的当前值是`false`。If you attempt to set this property to `false`, a exception is thrown, even if the current value of the property is `false`. 启用了监视后，可以使用， ， ，和实例来监视 CPU 和内存使用的各个应用程序域的属性。Once monitoring is enabled, you can use the , , , and instance properties to monitor CPU and memory use of individual application domains.

span.span: Requires full trust for the immediate caller.

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.

summary.span: 获取上次回收后保留下来的，已知由当前应用程序域引用的字节数。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个垃圾回收中的更新统计信息。The statistics are updated with each garbage collection. 但是，可确保仅在完整、 阻碍性回收; 后不准确也就是说，其中包括所有的生成和停止应用程序，同时集合的集合时发生。However, they are guaranteed to be accurate only after a full, blocking collection; that is, a collection that includes all generations and that stops the application while collection occurs. 例如，方法重载执行完整、 阻碍性回收。For example, the method overload performs a full, blocking collection. （并发集合在后台发生，并且不会阻止应用程序。）(Concurrent collection occurs in the background and does not block the application.)

summary.span: 获取自从进程启动后所有线程在当前应用程序域中执行时所使用的总处理器时间。

span.span: Gets the total processor time that has been used by all threads while executing in the current application domain, since the process started.

value.span: 当前应用程序域的总处理器时间。

span.span: Total processor time for the current application domain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 报告应用程序域的总时间包括该应用程序域中执行的进程中的每个线程所用的时间。The total time that is reported for an application domain includes the time each thread in the process spent executing in that application domain. 线程调用非托管代码程序仍与应用程序域，并执行应用程序域调用了报告的非托管的代码所用的处理器时间。A thread that calls into unmanaged code is still associated with an application domain, and the processor time spent executing the unmanaged code is reported for the application domain where the call was made. 当线程受阻或处于休眠状态，它不会消耗处理器时间百分比。When a thread is blocked or sleeping, it does not consume processor time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用创建的沙盒应用程序域方法重载具有一组同构权限; 即，相同的权限集授予对所有部分受信任的程序集加载到应用程序域。Sandboxed application domains that were created by using the method overload have a homogenous set of permissions; that is, the same set of permissions is granted to all partially trusted assemblies that are loaded into the application domain. 沙盒应用程序域 （可选） 有强名称的程序集设置，并改为使用完全信任运行此权限不受约束的列表。A sandboxed application domain optionally has a list of strong-named assemblies that are exempt from this permission set, and instead run with full trust.

summary.span: 当默认应用程序域的父进程存在时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the default application domain's parent process exits.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件可以执行终止活动，例如，关闭文件，释放存储空间等，在进程结束之前。The for this event can perform termination activities, such as closing files, releasing storage and so on, before the process ends. 从.NET Framework 2.0 版开始，在每个注册事件处理程序的应用程序域中引发此事件。Beginning with the .NET Framework version 2.0, this event is raised in each application domain that registers an event handler. > [!NOTE] > 总执行时间的所有事件处理程序是有限的就像总执行时间的所有终结器被限制在进程关闭。The total execution time of all event handlers is limited, just as the total execution time of all finalizers is limited at process shutdown. 默认值为两秒。The default is two seconds. 非托管的主机可以通过调用来更改此执行时间[iclrpolicymanager:: Settimeout](~/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/hosting/iclrpolicymanager-settimeout-method.md)方法替换[OPR_ProcessExit](~/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/hosting/eclroperation-enumeration.md)枚举值。An unmanaged host can change this execution time by calling the [ICLRPolicyManager::SetTimeout](~/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/hosting/iclrpolicymanager-settimeout-method.md) method with the [OPR_ProcessExit](~/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/hosting/eclroperation-enumeration.md) enumeration value. 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，此事件是引发仅在默认应用程序域，且仅当在默认应用程序域中注册事件处理程序。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, this event is raised only in the default application domain, and only if an event handler is registered in the default application domain. 若要注册此事件的事件处理程序，必须具有所需的权限，或引发。To register an event handler for this event, you must have the required permissions, or a is thrown. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
