summary.span: 当程序集的解析在仅限反射的上下文中失败时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the resolution of an assembly fails in the reflection-only context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在仅限反射上下文中，不会自动解析依赖项。In the reflection-only context, dependencies are not resolved automatically. 它们必须预加载或返回的此事件的处理程序。They must be preloaded or returned by the handler for this event. 程序集具有尚未加载到只反射上下文中的依赖项时，引发此事件。This event is raised when an assembly has a dependency that is not already loaded into the reflection-only context. 通过指定缺少的依赖项属性。The missing dependency is specified by the property. 为此事件必须返回满足依赖项的程序集。The for this event must return an assembly that satisfies the dependency. 返回的程序集必须加载到仅反射上下文。The assembly that is returned must be loaded into the reflection-only context. > [!IMPORTANT] > 要加载到仅反射上下文的程序集缺少的依赖项仅对引发此事件 (例如，通过使用方法)。This event is raised only for missing dependencies of the assembly that you are loading into the reflection-only context (for example, by using the method). 如果找不到要加载的程序集，它不被引发。It is not raised if the assembly that you are loading cannot be found. 开头[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，则属性返回请求无法解析的程序集加载的程序集。Beginning with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], the property returns the assembly that requested the assembly load that could not be resolved. 了解请求的程序集的标识可能标识正确版本的依赖项，如果多个版本都提供很有用。Knowing the identity of the requesting assembly might be useful in identifying the correct version of the dependency, if more than one version is available. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . 对于此事件，属性返回的程序集名称之前应用策略。For this event, the property returns the assembly name before policy is applied. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为此事件可以尝试查找包含该资源的程序集并将其返回。The for this event can attempt to locate the assembly containing the resource and return it. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果解析失败，因为没有文件可以找到有效的链接资源，不引发此事件。This event is not raised if resolution fails because no file can be found for a valid linked resource. 如果找不到清单资源流，但它不会引发如果找不到单独的资源键，则将引发该事件。It is raised if a manifest resource stream cannot be found, but it is not raised if an individual resource key cannot be found. 开头[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，则属性包含请求的资源的程序集。Beginning with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], the property contains the assembly that requested the resource. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . 若要注册此事件的事件处理程序，必须具有所需的权限，或引发。To register an event handler for this event, you must have the required permissions, or a is thrown. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法来插入项时，或修改名称数据对描述此实例的属性的内部缓存中的条目的值。Use this method to insert an entry, or modify the value of an entry in an internal cache of name-data pairs that describe properties of this instance of . 该缓存自动包含预定义的系统项的创建应用程序域时插入。The cache automatically contains predefined system entries that are inserted when the application domain is created. 无法插入或使用此方法修改系统项。You cannot insert or modify system entries with this method. 尝试来修改系统条目的方法调用不起任何作用;该方法不会引发异常。A method call that attempts to modify a system entry has no effect; the method does not throw an exception. 您可以检查与系统项的值方法或等效属性中所述。You can inspect the values of system entries with the method, or the equivalent properties described in . 可以为的值调用此方法以设置评估供应"REGEX_DEFAULT_MATCH_TIMEOUT"正则表达式模式的默认超时间隔的值`name`自变量和一个值，该值表示超时间隔的值为`data`参数。You can call this method to set the value of the default timeout interval for evaluating regular expression patterns by supply "REGEX_DEFAULT_MATCH_TIMEOUT" as the value of the `name` argument and a value that represents the timeout interval as the value of the `data` argument. 此外可以插入或修改使用此方法的用户定义名称数据对和检查它们的值与方法。You can also insert or modify your own user defined name-data pairs with this method and inspect their values with the method. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法来创建新的值对。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to create a new value pair. 该示例然后使用方法来检索值，并将其显示到控制台。The example then uses the method to retrieve the value, and displays it to the console. summary.span: 在对类型的解析失败时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the resolution of a type fails.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件发生时公共语言运行时不能确定程序集，可以创建请求的类型。The event occurs when the common language runtime is unable to determine the assembly that can create the requested type. 如果类型定义动态程序集中，或在动态程序集未定义类型，但运行时不知道该类型定义中的程序集，这可能发生。This can occur if the type is defined in a dynamic assembly, or the type is not defined in a dynamic assembly but the runtime does not know which assembly the type is defined in. 后一种情况可能发生时调用具有程序集名称不受限定的类型名称。The latter situation can occur when is called with a type name that is not qualified with the assembly name. 为此事件可以尝试查找并创建类型。The for this event can attempt to locate and create the type. 但是，事件，则不会运行时知道不能以查找特定程序集中的类型。However, the event does not occur if the runtime knows it is not possible to find a type in certain assemblies. 例如，如果因为运行时知道类型不能动态地添加到静态程序集未在静态程序集中找到的类型不会不会发生此事件。For example, this event does not occur if the type is not found in a static assembly because the runtime knows types cannot be added dynamically to static assemblies. 开头[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，则属性包含请求的类型的程序集。Beginning with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], the property contains the assembly that requested the type. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . 若要注册此事件的事件处理程序，必须具有所需的权限，或引发。To register an event handler for this event, you must have the required permissions, or a is thrown. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何事件。The following sample demonstrates the event. 有关运行此代码示例，必须提供完全限定的程序集名称。For this code example to run, you must provide the fully qualified assembly name. 有关如何获取完全限定的程序集名称的信息，请参阅[程序集名称](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md)。For information about how to obtain the fully qualified assembly name, see [Assembly Names](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md). [!code-cpp[AppDomain_TypeResolve#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomain_TypeResolve/CPP/typeresolve.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AppDomain_TypeResolve#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomain_TypeResolve/CS/typeresolve.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AppDomain_TypeResolve#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomain_TypeResolve/VB/typeresolve.vb#1)]

summary.span: 当某个异常未被捕获时出现。

span.span: Occurs when an exception is not caught.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件提供通知的未捕获的异常。This event provides notification of uncaught exceptions. 它允许应用程序的系统默认处理程序报告给用户异常和终止应用程序之前记录有关异常的信息。It allows the application to log information about the exception before the system default handler reports the exception to the user and terminates the application. 如果应用程序的状态的足够信息不可用，可能会采取其他措施，例如保存程序便于以后恢复数据。If sufficient information about the state of the application is available, other actions may be undertaken — such as saving program data for later recovery. 建议谨慎行事，因为未处理异常时，可能会损坏程序数据。Caution is advised, because program data can become corrupted when exceptions are not handled. > [!NOTE] > 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 中，应用程序终止时调试选项报告和对用户引发此事件之前，而不是后。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, application termination and debugging options are reported to the user before this event is raised, rather than after. 可以在任何应用程序域中处理此事件。This event can be handled in any application domain. 但是，不一定会引发事件在发生异常的应用程序域中。However, the event is not necessarily raised in the application domain where the exception occurred. 仅当没有找到适用的异常处理程序，因此可以引发该事件的第一个位置是在生成该线程的应用程序域中的线程的整个堆栈已被展开，会处理异常。An exception is unhandled only if the entire stack for the thread has been unwound without finding an applicable exception handler, so the first place the event can be raised is in the application domain where the thread originated. > [!NOTE] > 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 中，仅用于启动的应用程序时，系统会创建默认应用程序域时发生此事件。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, this event occurs only for the default application domain that is created by the system when an application is started. 如果应用程序可创建其他应用程序域，在这些应用程序域中指定此事件的委托无效。If an application creates additional application domains, specifying a delegate for this event in those applications domains has no effect. 如果默认应用程序域中处理事件，对于任何未经处理的异常在任何线程中，无论何种应用程序域启动的线程存在引发。If the event is handled in the default application domain, it is raised there for any unhandled exception in any thread, no matter what application domain the thread started in. 如果在具有的事件处理程序的应用程序域中启动线程，该应用程序域中引发该事件。If the thread started in an application domain that has an event handler for , the event is raised in that application domain. 如果该应用程序域不是默认应用程序域，并且在默认应用程序域中还有一个事件处理程序，将这两个应用程序域中引发事件。If that application domain is not the default application domain, and there is also an event handler in the default application domain, the event is raised in both application domains. 例如，假设中启动线程应用程序域"AD1"调用"AD2"的应用程序域中的方法，并从那里调用的方法在应用程序域"AD3"，它将引发异常。For example, suppose a thread starts in application domain "AD1", calls a method in application domain "AD2", and from there calls a method in application domain "AD3", where it throws an exception. 在其中的第一个应用程序域可以引发事件是"AD1"。The first application domain in which the event can be raised is "AD1". 如果该应用程序域不是默认应用程序域，那么还可以在默认应用程序域中引发该事件。If that application domain is not the default application domain, the event can also be raised in the default application domain. > [!NOTE] > 公共语言运行时挂起时的事件处理程序的线程中止执行事件。The common language runtime suspends thread aborts while event handlers for the event are executing. 如果事件处理程序具有属性带有相应标志的事件处理程序被视为受约束的执行区域。If the event handler has a attribute with the appropriate flags, the event handler is treated as a constrained execution region. 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，不会引发此事件的损坏状态的进程，如堆栈溢出，或者是访问冲突，除非事件处理程序是安全关键的并且具有异常属性。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], this event is not raised for exceptions that corrupt the state of the process, such as stack overflows or access violations, unless the event handler is security-critical and has the attribute. 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，在主应用程序线程以外的线程中出现未经处理的异常由运行时捕获，并因此不会导致应用程序终止。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, an unhandled exception that occurs in a thread other than the main application thread is caught by the runtime and therefore does not cause the application to terminate. 因此，很可能不终止的应用程序的情况下引发的事件。Thus, it is possible for the event to be raised without the application terminating. 从.NET Framework 2.0 版开始，此对子子线程中未经处理的异常已被移除，因为这种无提示失败的累积效应包含性能降低、 损坏的数据和锁定，所有这些非常难以调试。Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, this backstop for unhandled exceptions in child threads was removed, because the cumulative effect of such silent failures included performance degradation, corrupted data, and lockups, all of which were difficult to debug. 有关详细信息，包括一系列情况下在其中运行时不会终止，请参阅[托管线程异常](~/docs/standard/threading/exceptions-in-managed-threads.md)。For more information, including a list of cases in which the runtime does not terminate, see [Exceptions in Managed Threads](~/docs/standard/threading/exceptions-in-managed-threads.md). 若要注册此事件的事件处理程序，必须具有所需的权限，或引发。To register an event handler for this event, you must have the required permissions, or a is thrown. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## 未经处理的异常的其他事件Other Events for Unhandled Exceptions 对于某些应用程序模型，主应用程序线程中未经处理的异常时，可以由其他事件被抢占的事件。For certain application models, the event can be preempted by other events if the unhandled exception occurs in the main application thread. 使用 Windows 窗体的应用程序中未经处理的异常中的主应用程序线程原因事件被引发。In applications that use Windows Forms, unhandled exceptions in the main application thread cause the event to be raised. 如果此事件的处理，默认行为是未处理的异常不会终止该应用程序，尽管应用程序将继续处于未知状态。If this event is handled, the default behavior is that the unhandled exception does not terminate the application, although the application is left in an unknown state. 在这种情况下，不会引发事件。In that case, the event is not raised. 可以更改此行为，通过使用应用程序配置文件，或通过使用方法以将模式更改为之前挂接事件处理程序。This behavior can be changed by using the application configuration file, or by using the method to change the mode to before the event handler is hooked up. 这仅适用于主应用程序线程。This applies only to the main application thread. 的未经处理的异常引发在其他线程中引发事件。The event is raised for unhandled exceptions thrown in other threads. 从 Microsoft Visual Studio 2005 开始，Visual Basic 应用程序框架提供的主应用程序线程中未经处理异常的另一个事件。Starting with Microsoft Visual Studio 2005, the Visual Basic application framework provides another event for unhandled exceptions in the main application thread. 请参阅事件。See the event. 此事件有一个事件参数对象使用的事件参数对象与同名，但具有不同的属性。This event has an event arguments object with the same name as the event arguments object used by , but with different properties. 具体而言，此事件参数对象具有属性，它允许应用程序继续运行，将忽略未处理的异常 （和应用程序处于未知状态）。In particular, this event arguments object has an property that allows the application to continue running, ignoring the unhandled exception (and leaving the application in an unknown state). 在这种情况下，不会引发事件。In that case, the event is not raised. ## Examples 以下示例演示了事件。The followingexample demonstrates the event. 它定义了一个事件处理程序`MyHandler`，每当在默认应用程序域中引发未经处理的异常时调用。It defines an event handler, `MyHandler`, that is invoked whenever an unhandled exception is thrown in the default application domain. 然后，它会引发两种例外情况。It then throws two exceptions. 第一个由**try/catch**块。The first is handled by a **try/catch** block. 第二个是未经处理并调用`MyHandle`例程之前在应用程序终止。The second is unhandled and invokes the `MyHandle` routine before the application terminates. [!code-cpp[AppDomain_UnhandledException#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomain_UnhandledException/CPP/unhandledexception.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AppDomain_UnhandledException#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomain_UnhandledException/CS/unhandledexception.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AppDomain_UnhandledException#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomain_UnhandledException/VB/unhandledexception.vb#1)]

summary.span: 卸载指定的应用程序域。

span.span: Unloads the specified application domain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 2.0 版中没有线程专用于卸载应用程序域。In the .NET Framework version 2.0 there is a thread dedicated to unloading application domains. 这提高了可靠性，尤其是在.NET Framework 承载。This improves reliability, especially when the .NET Framework is hosted. 当线程调用，目标域做标记以进行卸载。When a thread calls , the target domain is marked for unloading. 专用的线程尝试卸载域，并在域中的所有线程都将立即都中止。The dedicated thread attempts to unload the domain, and all threads in the domain are aborted. 如果一个线程不会中止，例如因为它正在执行非托管的代码，或因为正在执行它`finally`块中的，然后在一段时间后最初调用线程中引发。If a thread does not abort, for example because it is executing unmanaged code, or because it is executing a `finally` block, then after a period of time a is thrown in the thread that originally called . 如果无法最终中止的线程结束时，目标域不是卸载。If the thread that could not be aborted eventually ends, the target domain is not unloaded. 因此，在.NET Framework 2.0 版`domain`不能保证卸载，因为它可能无法终止正在执行的线程。Thus, in the .NET Framework version 2.0 `domain` is not guaranteed to unload, because it might not be possible to terminate executing threads. > [!NOTE] > 在某些情况下，调用会导致立即，例如它在终结器调用。In some cases, calling causes an immediate , for example if it is called in a finalizer. 中的线程`domain`使用终止方法，将引发线程中。The threads in `domain` are terminated using the method, which throws a in the thread. 尽管立即终止线程，但它仍可以继续执行不可预测中的时间量`finally`子句。Although the thread should terminate promptly, it can continue executing for an unpredictable amount of time in a `finally` clause. ## 版本兼容性Version Compatibility .NET Framework 版本 1.0 和 1.1 中，如果线程的调用中是否正在`domain`，另一个线程开始执行卸载操作。In the .NET Framework version 1.0 and 1.1 if the thread that calls is running in `domain`, another thread is started to perform the unload operation. 如果`domain`不能卸载不在原始线程上调用，该线程中引发。If `domain` cannot be unloaded, a is thrown in that thread, not in the original thread that called . 但是，如果调用线程外部运行`domain`，线程都会收到异常。However, if the thread that calls is running outside `domain`, that thread receives the exception. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何卸载应用程序域。The following code example shows how to unload an application domain. [!code-cpp[ADUnload#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADUnload/CPP/adunload.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ADUnload#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADUnload/CS/adunload.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ADUnload#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADUnload/VB/adunload.vb#1)]
